title: can't refund my champions
body: the titile say it all i can't find my champions in my purchases so i can refund them

replies.body: i have refund token but the champions is more than 90 days but i need to refund them :(

Hey there! 

Previous purchases will only show content purchased in the last 90 days, not your entire purchase history. 

If you'd like to open a ticket with Player Support, please make sure you still have a refund token available and that the purchase you're looking to refund (a champion in your case)  occurred within the past 90 days.

Hope this helps!
ok how i can send a ticket i didn't do this before
Top right of this page, you click the tab labeled **Support**. On the top of that page, you create a Support profile, and **Submit a Request**.
Even if it's been too long for you to refund it, you can try sending in a Support Ticket and requesting they refund it for you manually. They don't have to, but they might.
ow long ago did you buy them
